BigPipe

A radical new node.js framework

Home Modules GitHub project Currently v0.9.2

© 2015. All rights reserved.

Core projects

These are the individual components of the bigpipe framework.
  • bigpipe - A radical new web framework for Node.js optimized for modularity
  • bigpipe.js - The client-side library which is used in BigPipe to orchestrate the pagelets.
  • pagelet - Pagelets are small re-usable composable standalone components that are used as the building blocks of your site.
  • fortress - Fortress is the Docker for front-end applications. It allows you to your code in a controlled and sandboxed environment.
  • temper - Temper is a small module that compiles your templates for server-side usage and client-side usage through one single interface.

Development Helpers

Helpers in development of BigPipe
  • assume - Human readable assert library for browsers and node.
  • bigpipe-watch - Bigpipe plugin that will watch added pages, pagelets and their views for easy developing. As soon as a file is changed the content will be rediscovered and reloaded into Bigpipe's internals.
  • illuminati - Illuminati is a test runner for mocha tests in node or phantom

Dependencies

These are the building blocks, experiments, components of our framework which have been reduced to smallers bits of re-usable open source code.
  • supply - Supply is a minimal but high performance middleware system for Node.js.
  • fusing - Fusing is a small library that creates the base class that is used in all of bigpipe's components.
  • hotpath - Hotpath is memory restricted cache layer.
  • zipline - Zipline attempts to discover what content encoding is supported for a given HTTP request. As research from Yahoo has shown you cannot trust the contents of the Accept-Encoding header and just "roll" with that.
  • bootstrap-pagelet - This Pagelet is responsible for bootstrapping the client side of BigPipe and keeping state on the child pagelet queue.
  • async-script - Async load a javascript file.
  • async-asset - Asynchronously load front-end assets. And with async, we mean truly async. Loading scripts async isn't that hard but loading a CSS file fully async in a cross browser manner can be utterly painful.
  • floppy - Floppy a file representation for assets. It will automatically clean up after it self after all dependent processes eject it.
  • fabricator - Discover collections of constructible instances from strings (filepaths), arrays or objects.
  • diagnostics-pagelet - Default diagnostics Pagelet used by the diagnostics and 500 Pagelet.
  • 500-pagelet - This Pagelet is responsible for displaying server errors.
  • 404-pagelet - This Pagelet is responsible for displaying 404 errors.
  • fn.name - Extract the name of a given function. Nothing more than that.
  • predefine - Predefine makes Object.defineProperties your human readable and manageable.
  • routable - Routable is a lightweight regular expression inspired HTTP route parser for Node.js.
  • frames - Frames is a simple helper function that creates a pre-configured iframe and appends it to the given DOM element while providing a nice API for interacting with the iframe.
  • supreme - The sfs file system that we've developed is build against the native bindings of the module and all API calls have been tweaked for our specific use case.
  • backtrace - A simple utility to create a full and human readable stack trace across node and browsers old ancient browsers which can be manipulated.
  • smithy - Preprocessing of CSS/JS meta-languages made easy through a singular API
  • parsifal - Parsifal is a pure JavaScript port of jQuery's .val() method which is used to retrieve values from from elements.
  • containerization - Front-end code containization through iframes
  • alcatraz - Alcatraz is high-security prison for your application code.
  • trailers - Trailing headers can be sent after you've already written your initial HTTP headers, trailers.
  • replaces - Replaces is a micro library that moves the data formatting instructions to the template placeholders using special modifier chars.
  • fittings - Fittings allows you to easily fit different client-side frameworks in to BigPipe.
